articles.content: There was a time when Elon Musk was fond of combustion-engined cars so much so that he bought one of the best ever made: the McLaren F1. This video from 1999 ironically gives us something Justine Wil… [+2212 chars]

articles.title: Mistaken identity sends microcap Signal Advance Inc. soaring - Seeking Alpha
articles.description: Signal Advance Inc. (OTCPK:SIGL) more than quintupled today after Tesla's (NASDAQ:TSLA) Elon Musk tweeted on Thursday to ``use Signal,'' referencing the secure messaging service.

articles.author: Megan Henney
articles.title: PPP loan applications are now open for small businesses: Everything to know - Fox Business
articles.description: The Paycheck Protection Program, a vital lifeline that helped keep pandemic-ravaged small businesses afloat, reopened to applicants on Monday with several key changes put in place.
articles.content: The Paycheck Protection Program, a vital lifeline that helped keep pandemic-ravaged small businesses afloat, reopened to applicants on Monday with several key changes put in place to eliminate fraud … [+3654 chars]
